comments:
For some strange reason my Any editor has started throwing an OutOfMemoryError quite frequently. (less than 5min of use...consistently reproducible).

It started happening with 3.3 on Sun 1.5 sr11 so I switched to build i1010-1200 and ibm 1.5 sr5a and it still happens. 

When I turn off "auto reconcile" it stops happening. Here is a stack trace.


!ENTRY org.eclipse.ui 2 0 2007-10-11 13:40:57.546
!MESSAGE Save Failed
!STACK 0
java.lang.OutOfMemoryError
        at java.lang.StringBuffer.ensureCapacityImpl(StringBuffer.java:386)
        at java.lang.StringBuffer.append(StringBuffer.java:234)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.PropertyHelper.replaceProperties(PropertyHelper.java:286)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.Project.replaceProperties(Project.java:602)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Property.addProperties(Property.java:552)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Property.loadFile(Property.java:463)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.taskdefs.Property.execute(Property.java:391)
        at org.apache.tools.ant.UnknownElement.execute(UnknownElement.java:288)
        at org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.model.AntPropertyNode.configure(AntPropertyNode.java:103)
        at org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.model.AntModel.resolveBuildfile(AntModel.java:504)
        at org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.model.AntModel.parseDocument(AntModel.java:329)
        at org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.model.AntModel.reconcile(AntModel.java:265)
        at org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.model.AntModel.updateMarkers(AntModel.java:1549)
        at org.eclipse.ant.internal.ui.editor.AntEditor.doSave(AntEditor.java:1018)
        at org.eclipse.ui.texteditor.AbstractTextEditor$TextEditorSavable.doSave(AbstractTextEditor.java:6783)
        at org.eclipse.ui.Saveable.doSave(Saveable.java:212)
Correction, it just takes longer to happen if "auto reconcile" is turned off but it still happens.
